message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product at a starting price of $20,000. I know you'll find it valuable.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $17,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I still believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. My final offer is $15,000.
